scripts.build: tsc && mkdir -p dist/syncApplication && cp src/functions/syncApplication/function.json dist/syncApplication/ && sed 's|"\.\./\.\./|"\.\./|g' dist/functions/syncApplication/index.js > dist/syncApplication/index.js && cp host.json dist/ && cp local.settings.json dist/ 2>/dev/null || true && cp package.json dist/ && (cd dist && npm install --omit=dev 2>/dev/null || true)
scripts.start: npm run build && cd dist && func start
